body_html: I assume you're trying to use the contrib/mpi extension to TF. Did you follow the configuration instructions to select this library? See tensorflow/contrib/mpi/README.md I have not used this package myself. I'm suspicious that you're setting TF_NEED_MPI=0 in your env. Is that correct?
body_text: I assume you're trying to use the contrib/mpi extension to TF.  Did you follow the configuration instructions to select this library?   See tensorflow/contrib/mpi/README.md    I have not used this package myself.  I'm suspicious that you're setting TF_NEED_MPI=0 in your env.  Is that correct?
body: I assume you're trying to use the contrib/mpi extension to TF.  Did you follow the configuration instructions to select this library?   See tensorflow/contrib/mpi/README.md    I have not used this package myself.  I'm suspicious that you're setting TF_NEED_MPI=0 in your env.  Is that correct?
